titleStmt.title: A gagg to Love's advocate: or, An assertion of the justice of the Parlament in the execution of Mr Love. By J.H. Esq.
titleStmt.author: J. H.
Hinde, John, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Du-Gard printer to the Council of State,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Wing suggests that S.H. = John Hinde.
